Title: b'Seasonal Staffing Coordinator (San Francisco):'

Description:
b"The Seasonal Retail Sales Associate is responsible for providing outstanding customer service, meeting hourly sales and Star Rewards goals on a personal and departmental basis, and demonstrating superior product knowledge to customers during periods of high volume. \xc2\xa0To create a shopping experience that will make the customer feel welcome and comfortable. The associate is also responsible for fulfillment and performing other duties as necessary.
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

Be proficient in POS and MPOS systems including Search and Send, My Client and More@ Macy\xe2\x80\x99s tablet app
Proactive in assisting customers who are using devices to shop and compare, whether Macy\xe2\x80\x99s devices or their own
Assist customers in all aspects of total store fulfillment and have the ability to satisfy the needs of our digital and physical customers by making appropriate partnerships when necessary.
Provide an exceptional customer experience by ensuring the customer is always the priority
Acknowledge customers in a friendly and helpful manner within 30 seconds of their entry into the area
Handle all returns courteously and professionally
Determine customer needs based on personal features and other customer preference related factors
Demonstrate knowledge of store products and services to build sales and minimize returns
Suggest additional merchandise to compliment customer selection
Offer to call other locations if merchandise is unavailable within store
Offer to put purchase on customer\xe2\x80\x99s Macy\xe2\x80\x99s charge account toward the end of the shopping experience
Reinforce customer\xe2\x80\x99s selection and package merchandise with care
Invite customers to come back and thank them by name whenever possible
Responsible for achieving personal sales goals and Star Reward goals
Maintain a professional attitude with sincerity and enthusiasm reflecting Macy\xe2\x80\x99s commitment to our customer-the most important person in our stores
Develop product knowledge by reading current vendor tags and pamphlets and attending training classes in order to communicate it to the customer
Be aware of current promotional events and sales
Maintain department recovery standards; including fitting room go backs to standard, if applicable
Adhere to Asset Protection and inventory control and compliance procedures
Perform other duties as necessary
Follows shortage programs and procedures\xc2\xa0
Perform these functions in an efficient manner, as directed by the Supervisor\xc2\xa0
Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality

\xc2\xa0QUALIFICATIONS:
Education/Experience: \xc2\xa0No specific educational accomplishment is required. \xc2\xa0No experience is required.
Communication Skills: \xc2\xa0Effective written and verbal skills, ability to interpret instructional documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals. Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Mathematical Skills: \xc2\xa0Basic math functions such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. \xc2\xa0Able to use a calculator.\xc2\xa0
Reasoning Ability: \xc2\xa0Self-starter, able to work independently and as part of a team and must have good time management skills.
Physical Demands: \xc2\xa0This position involves constant moving and standing. \xc2\xa0Involves standing for at least two consecutive hours. \xc2\xa0Involves lifting at least 30 lbs. \xc2\xa0May occasionally involve reaching, stooping, kneeling, crouching, and climbing ladders. \xc2\xa0May involve reaching above eye level. Involves close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Other skills: \xc2\xa0Must be able to collaborate and function as part of a team. \xc2\xa0Possess a strong sense of urgency. \xc2\xa0Must enjoy meeting and interacting with customers. \xc2\xa0Possess a thirst for learning. Should be comfortable with the use of computers and frequent use of RF equipment.
Work Hours: \xc2\xa0Flexible with scheduling and available to work retail hours, which may include day, evening, weekends, and/or holidays, based on department and store/company needs.
_____________________________________________________________________
This job description is not all inclusive. In addition, Macy's, Inc. reserves the right to amend this job description at any time. Macy\xe2\x80\x99s, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment.

Title: b'Seasonal Retail Sales Associate (San Francisco)'

Description:
b"The Seasonal Cosmetics/Fragrance Cashier is responsible for providing professional service to customers by ringing up fragrance purchases during the holiday season. The associate is also responsible for fulfillment and performing other duties as necessary.
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

Be proficient in POS and MPOS systems including Search and Send, My Client and More@ Macy\xe2\x80\x99s tablet app
Proactive in assisting customers who are using devices to shop and compare, whether Macy\xe2\x80\x99s devices or their own
Assist customers in all aspects of total store fulfillment and have the ability to satisfy the needs of our digital and physical customers by making appropriate partnerships when necessary.
Provide an exceptional customer experience by ensuring the customer is always the priority
Acknowledge customers in a friendly and helpful manner within 30 seconds of their entry into the area
Be knowledgeable of and perform sales support functions related to POS procedures
Handle all returns courteously and professionally
Sell cosmetics and related merchandise according to customer service techniques and professional selling skills
Determine customer needs based on personal features and other customer preference related factors
Alert Cosmetics Counter Manager or Cosmetics Sales Manager of inventory and other inaccuracies
Attend product training classes and seminars and participate in pre-selling drives to maximize sales
Ensure proper presentation, organization, storing, and replenishment of stock
Ensure timely processing of new receipts, damages, testers, and return to vendors (RTVs)
Maintain good housekeeping and department recovery standards
Ensure work area is free from hazards and work in a safe manner
Adhere to Asset Protection and inventory control and compliance procedures
Be in compliance with all hygiene standards
Perform other duties as necessary
Follows shortage programs and procedures\xc2\xa0
Perform these functions in an efficient manner, as directed by the Supervisor\xc2\xa0
Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality

QUALIFICATIONS:
Education/Experience: \xc2\xa0High School degree or equivalent. \xc2\xa0Prior experience a plus.
Communication Skills: \xc2\xa0Effective written and verbal skills, ability to interpret instructional documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals. Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Mathematical Skills: \xc2\xa0Basic math functions such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. \xc2\xa0Able to use a calculator.\xc2\xa0
Reasoning Ability: \xc2\xa0Self-starter, able to work independently and as part of a team and must have good time management skills.
Physical Demands: \xc2\xa0This position involves constant moving and standing. \xc2\xa0Involves standing for at least two consecutive hours. \xc2\xa0Involves lifting at least 30 lbs. \xc2\xa0May occasionally involve reaching, stooping, kneeling, crouching, and climbing ladders. \xc2\xa0May involve reaching above eye level. Involves close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Other skills: \xc2\xa0Superior organizational and time management skills. \xc2\xa0Must be able to multi-task in a fast-paced environment during constant periods of high volume. \xc2\xa0Must be able to build relationships and influence others. \xc2\xa0Must possess a thirst for knowledge. \xc2\xa0Must be flexible in regards to hours worked. Ability to collaborate and function as a member of a team. \xc2\xa0Must possess a strong sense of urgency. Should be comfortable with the use of computers and frequent use of RF equipment.
Work Hours: \xc2\xa0Flexible with scheduling and available to work retail hours, which may include day, evening, weekends, and/or holidays based on department and store/company needs.
This job description is not all inclusive. In addition, Macy's, Inc. reserves the right to amend this job description at any time. Macy\xe2\x80\x99s, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment."

Title: b'Seasonal Cosmetics/Fragrance Cashier - San Franciso:'

Description:
b"Responsible for supervising, training, and developing assigned associates; managing Lead-on-duty and Command Central stations; supporting the Director and/or Manager in completing special projects; managing departmental queues; performing other duties as assigned.\xc2\xa0
Essential Functions

Managing lead stations including Lead-on-duty and Command Central.
Coaching associates and administering performance feedback.
Monitoring and documenting associates\xe2\x80\x99 performance on the phone.
Tracking associates\xe2\x80\x99 attendance.\xc2\xa0
Regular, dependable attendance & punctuality. \xc2\xa0

Qualifications
Education/Experience:

High school diploma or general education degree (GED) required \xc2\xa0
One to three months related experience and/or training preferred

Communication Skills:

Ability to read and interpret documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals
Write routine reports and correspondence
Speak effectively before groups of customers and employees of the organization

Mathematical Skills:\xc2\xa0

Ability to calculate figures and amounts such as discounts, interest, commissions, proportions, percentages, area, circumference, and volume
Apply concepts of basic algebra and geometry

Reasoning Ability:\xc2\xa0

Ability to solve practical problems and work with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists
Interpret a variety of instructions furnished in written, oral, diagram, or schedule form

Physical Demands:\xc2\xa0

Frequently required to sit, use hands to finger, handle, and feel, and to lift and/or move up to 10 pounds
Occasionally required to stand, walk, and reach with hands and arms; requires close vision

Other Skills:\xc2\xa0

Ability to provide outstanding customer service to external and internal customers on a consistent basis; computer navigation and keyboarding skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills; ability to work independently and effectively multi-task\xc2\xa0

Work Hours:\xc2\xa0

Ability to work a flexible schedule based on department and company needs\xc2\xa0

This job description is not all inclusive. In addition, Macy's, Inc. reserves the right to amend this job description at any time. Macy\xe2\x80\x99s, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment.\xc2\xa0
\xc2\xa0"
Title: b'Lead Authorizer, Credit Granting Department:  Job '

Description:
b"Responsible for training, supervising, coaching, and developing assigned associates; taking escalated and incoming customer calls; reviewing customer inquiries regarding Co Brand billing errors; following up on customer accounts; completing queues; performing other duties as assigned. \xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0
\xc2\xa0Essential Functions

Train, supervise, coach, and develop staff; track attendance; provide input on performance evaluations.
Monitor lead chats and work with bridge to adjust staff.
Track departmental statistical information.
Monitor associate workload and performance.
Handle associate problems and concerns effectively.
Resolve customer calls and written complaints directed to management.
Complete special projects.
Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality. \xc2\xa0

Qualifications \xc2\xa0

Title: b'Electronic Gift Representative:  Job'

Description:
b"The Jewelry Clerical is responsible for processing new merchandise and maintaining all of the records for the Jewelry Department. \xc2\xa0Other responsibilities coincide with support and clerical functions. Perform other duties as assigned.
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

Be proficient in POS and MPOS systems including Search and Send, My Client and More@ Macy\xe2\x80\x99s tablet app
Proactive in assisting customers who are using devices to shop and compare, whether Macy\xe2\x80\x99s devices or their own
Assist customers in all aspects of service fulfillment (i.e. BOPs), and have the ability to qualify customer needs, figure out what's right for them, and then get them in touch with the right associate, MBA, or Personal Shopper
Provide an exceptional customer experience by ensuring the customer is always the priority
Check-in all new merchandise in a secure off-floor location with another associate
Use RF equipment to scan out damages, transfers, and return to vendor merchandise
Perform price changes as needed
Rearrange jewelry cases for new merchandise, season changes, special events, and clearance sets
Prepare monthly jeweler invoices and send to the Jewelry Center
Pack all customer sizing and repair orders
Pack outbound shipments to the Jewelry Center
Organize and file shipping, receiving, customer sizing, repair, sales, and return documentation
Be aware of supply inventory and place orders when needed
Print and reconcile the Stock Activity Journal for the Jewelry and Watch departments
Replenish displays and other products as needed
Assist in the inventory process
Maintain orderliness and cleanliness of jewelry counters and area
Attend to customer service needs in a friendly and helpful manner when approached
Maintain high customer readiness standards by delivering a clean, neat, easy to shop store environment
Assist with special projects as assigned
Follows shortage programs and procedures\xc2\xa0
Perform these functions in an efficient manner, as directed by the Supervisor\xc2\xa0
Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality

QUALIFICATIONS:
Education/Experience: \xc2\xa0No specific educational accomplishments are necessary. \xc2\xa0No experience is needed. \xc2\xa0
Communication Skills: \xc2\xa0Effective written and verbal skills, ability to interpret instructional documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions, and procedure manuals. \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0
Mathematical Skills: \xc2\xa0Basic math functions such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. \xc2\xa0Able to use a calculator.\xc2\xa0
Reasoning Ability: \xc2\xa0Self-starter, able to work independently and as part of a team and must have good time management skills.
Physical Demands: \xc2\xa0This position involves constant moving and standing. \xc2\xa0Involves standing for at least two consecutive hours. \xc2\xa0Involves lifting at least 30 lbs. \xc2\xa0May occasionally involve reaching, stooping, kneeling, crouching, and climbing ladders. \xc2\xa0May involve reaching above eye level. Involves close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Other skills: \xc2\xa0Ability to collaborate and function as a member of a team. \xc2\xa0Must possess a strong sense of urgency. \xc2\xa0Should be comfortable with the use of computers and frequent use of RF equipment.
Work Hours: \xc2\xa0Flexible with scheduling and available to work retail hours, which may include day, evening, weekends, and/or holidays, based on department and store/company needs.

Title: b'Jewelry Clerical Associate:'

Description:
b"The Jewelry Lead is responsible for maximizing sales and profits through the development of a quality sales organization and appropriate merchandise content within an area of the store. The Lead is also responsible for fulfillment and performing other duties as necessary, including new receipts, merchandising, markdowns, and signing.
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

Be proficient in POS and MPOS systems including Search and Send, My Client and More@ Macy\xe2\x80\x99s tablet app
Proactively assist customers who are using devices to shop and compare, whether Macy\xe2\x80\x99s devices or their own
Assist customers in all aspects of total store fulfillment and have the ability to satisfy the needs of our digital and physical customers by making appropriate partnerships when necessary
Provide an exceptional customer experience by ensuring the customer is always the priority
Drive Pre-sell results through daily communication and recognition
Ensure merchandising process goes smoothly and recover department to floor readiness standards\xc2\xa0
Maintain a consistent, high level of customer service within the jewelry complex. Consistently provide feedback on associate MAGIC behaviors to their direct supervisor.
Use computer system to monitor sales results for the Jewelry complex and maintain awareness of the area\xe2\x80\x99s business\xc2\xa0
Ensure all Jewelry procedures, policies, standards, and Fine Jewelry Operations are understood and followed by associates\xc2\xa0
Manage the tools used to create professional selling standards, including My Client, product knowledge material, selling techniques, and point of sale system.\xc2\xa0
Maintain acceptable presentation standards on the selling floor through proper utilization of visual displays and merchandise content
Manage adherence to Merchandise Availability Protection Standards (MAP) and maintain a high level of associate awareness regarding shortage
Support the execution of physical inventory process for Jewelry\xc2\xa0
Execute sale set-ups, stock put away, fill-in, signing, and markdowns in a timely manner
Be knowledgeable of POS policies and procedures and be able to train and coach associates on the POS functions
Review advertising calendar and maintain floor presentation to maximize sales opportunities
Build enthusiasm and awareness of promotional events amongst selling staff
Review business driving opportunities with management and coordinate implementation within area
Communicate information from buyers, vendors, and planners on product knowledge and merchandise presentation to the selling team build awareness of customer requests regarding merchandise mix
Maintain contact with all levels of management at the store and district level to obtain direction and support
Adhere to Asset Protection and inventory control and compliance procedures
Maintain department recovery standards; including fitting room go backs to standard, if applicable
Follows shortage programs and procedures\xc2\xa0
Perform these functions in an efficient manner, as directed by the supervisor\xc2\xa0
Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality

\xc2\xa0
QUALIFICATIONS:
Education/Experience: High School Diploma or equivalent required. \xc2\xa0Minimum of one to five year\xe2\x80\x99s of experience in retail sales is required.
Communication Skills: \xc2\xa0Effective written and verbal skills, ability to interpret instructional documents such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions and procedure manuals. \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0

Title: b'Jewelry Lead Associate:  '

Description:
b"The Jewelry Sales associate is responsible for providing outstanding customer service in the Jewelry & Watch Complex. This includes meeting hourly sales and Star Rewards goals on a personal and departmental basis, demonstrating superior product knowledge to customers, building a clientele using the clientele system, offering the customer our extended service plan and creating a shopping experience that will make the customer feel welcome and comfortable. \xc2\xa0The Jewelry Sales associate will participate in ongoing training via the IPAD as well as attend vendor and trainer facilitated trainings. Additionally, all Jewelry Sales associates participate in all aspects of ensuring the department is operating efficiently including but not limited to processing goods, merchandising, taking price changes, setting and signing sales, doing RTVs, BOPS & Fulfillment.\xc2\xa0
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

Be proficient in use of all POS and MPOS systems including Search and Send, My Client and More@ Macy\xe2\x80\x99s tablet app

Use clientele program to maintain customer profile and contact information to increase personal sales and build solid customer base

Mathematical Skills: \xc2\xa0Basic math functions such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. \xc2\xa0Able to use a calculator.\xc2\xa0
Reasoning Ability: \xc2\xa0Self-starter, able to work independently and as part of a team and must have good time management skills.
Physical Demands: \xc2\xa0This position involves constant moving, talking, hearing, reaching, and standing. \xc2\xa0Involves standing for at least two consecutive hours. \xc2\xa0Involves lifting at least 30 lbs. \xc2\xa0May occasionally involve stooping, kneeling, crouching, and climbing ladders. \xc2\xa0Vision abilities include close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Other skills: \xc2\xa0Superior organizational and time management skills. \xc2\xa0Must be able to multi-task in a fast-paced environment. \xc2\xa0Must be able to build relationships and influence others. \xc2\xa0Must possess a thirst for knowledge. Ability to collaborate and function as a member of a team. \xc2\xa0Must possess a strong sense of urgency. Should be comfortable with the use of computers and frequent use of RF equipment.
Work Hours: \xc2\xa0Flexible with scheduling and available to work retail hours, which may include day, evening, weekends, and/or holidays, based on department and store/company needs.

Description:
b"100,000 Opportunities Job Fair - May 5, 2016 - Seattle, WA
Macy's will be participating in the Seattle 100,000 Opportunities Job Fair, interviewing to fill Retail Sales and Retail Support positions in the Seattle metro area.
Please select the location where you have an interest in working, then click the store name to access and complete the on-line application:

Macy\xe2\x80\x99s Seattle (Downtown)\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x93 300 Pine Street, Seattle, WA 98101 (Posting 71362567)
Macy\xe2\x80\x99s Seattle Northgate\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x93 401 NE Northgate Way, Seattle, WA 98125 (Posting 71362568)
Macy\xe2\x80\x99s Southcenter\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x93 500 South Center Mall, Tukwila, WA, 98188 (Posting 71454903)
Macy\xe2\x80\x99s Seatac Commons At Federal Way\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x93 1901 South Commons, Federal Way, WA 98003 (Posting 71454905)
Macy\xe2\x80\x99s Tacoma\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x93 4502 South Steele, Tacoma, WA 98409 (Posting 71454904)
Macy\xe2\x80\x99s Bellevue Square\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x93 400 Bellevue Square, Bellevue, WA 98004 (Posting 71362569)
Macy\xe2\x80\x99s Alderwood\xc2\xa0\xe2\x80\x93 18700 Alderwood Mall Blvd., Lynnwood, WA 98037 (Posting 71362570)

As a Retail Sales Associate, you will be an integral part of creating a shopping experience that will make customers feel welcome and confortable. \xc2\xa0Sales Associates provide outstanding customer service, meet hourly sales and Star Rewards goals on a personal and departmental basis, demonstrate superior product knowledge to customers and perform other duties as assigned.
As a Retail Support Associate, you will be responsible for the Merchandising, Fulfillment and Buy On Line Pick Up In Store process as well as achieving sales plan by ensuring proper product placement and flow of new receipts. You will \xc2\xa0create an enhanced shopping experience and support the selling process by leveraging relationships throughout the store in order to attend to the customer. \xc2\xa0Other operational duties include floor moves, replenishment, inventory; shortage control, stockroom organization, and other duties as assigned.
\xc2\xa0Macy's is an Equal Opportunity Employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment."
Title: b"Macy's is Hiring Retail Sales and Retail Support in Seattle, WA -"

Description:
b"Surprise. \xc2\xa0Delight. \xc2\xa0Engage. \xc2\xa0Amaze.
As a Seasonal Sales Associate, you're the cornerstone in bringing the magic of Macy's to life for our customers - engaging, interacting, and delighting them with smart merchandise recommendations and outstanding customer service.
You'll work independently and as part of a high-performance retail team, using your enthusiasm and great attitude to amaze our customers and help create a memorable shopping experience. \xc2\xa0 You'll also have an opportunity to impact omni-channel customers, by pulling merchandise to fulfill online orders. \xc2\xa0
Schedule
It takes a lot of time to create that magical shopping experience, so many of our associates arrive in the early morning hours, while others stay later to set the stage for the next day.
You'll have the opportunity to work a flexible schedule on a part-time temporary basis. which may include mornings, evenings, weekends, and busy events like Thanksgiving, Black Friday and the day after Christmas.
Generous Employee Discount - Bigger, Better, Faster, More!
Just in time for holiday shopping, you'll receive a generous employee discount of up to 20% on most items starting your first day - and that's on top of other coupons, promotions, and specials.
Physical Demands
You'll be on your feet a lot - this jobs involves a lot of moving and standing (at least two consecutive hours). \xc2\xa0You'll need to be able to lift at least 30 pounds, and may occasionally need to reach, stoop, kneel, crouch, climb ladders, and reach above eye level. \xc2\xa0The job also involves close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Apply Now
Become a part of our Macy's Seasonal Retail Sales Team and start making magic - apply today!"
Title: b'Seasonal Sales Associate'

Description:
b"Dependable. \xc2\xa0Helpful. \xc2\xa0Inviting. \xc2\xa0Exciting.
Do you want to be at the center of everything that's happening? \xc2\xa0Our Seasonal Customer Experience Associates do exactly that, bringing the magic of Macy's to life for every customer who walks through our doors. \xc2\xa0From replenishing merchandise on the sales floor to interacting with customers to fulfilling online orders, you're part of the big picture and the daily details.
Schedule
You'll work flexible hours in our retail stores, with the possibility to work nights, mornings, and busy days such as weekends and/or holidays, depending on your store's specific needs.
Save on Holiday Shopping!
When you start at Macy's, you'll receive a generous employee discount of up to 20% on most items, on top of our other specials. coupons, promotions.
Physical Demands
You'll be on the move (at least two consecutive hours at a time), talking with customers and assisting them with their needs. \xc2\xa0You'll need to be able to lift at least 30 pounds, and may occasionally need to reach, stoop, kneel, crouch, climb ladders, and reach above eye level. \xc2\xa0This job also involves close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Apply Now
Ready to dive in? \xc2\xa0Apply today to be a Seasonal Customer Experience Associate!"
Title: b'Seasonal Customer Experience Associate'

Description:
b"Collaborate. \xc2\xa0Participate. \xc2\xa0Engage. \xc2\xa0Amaze.
Do you have a head for organization? \xc2\xa0Become part of our Seasonal Merchandising Team and bring the magic of Macy's to life! \xc2\xa0You'll enhance customer shopping experiences by placing and displaying merchandise around our stores and assisting with pricing and signing. You'll also have the opportunity to impact omni-channel customers by pulling merchandise to fulfill online orders.
Schedule
You'll be preparing the store for the start of each day, so many of our associates work the early morning hours, while our night owls stay late to get the store ready for the next morning.
In general, you'll work a flexible schedule on a part-time temporary basis, which may include weekends, as well as busy days like Thanksgiving, Black Friday, and the day after Christmas.
Save on Holiday Shopping!
When you start at Macy's, you'll receive a generous employee discount of up to 20% on most items, on top of our other specials, coupons, promotions.
Physical Demands
No standing desk needed here! \xc2\xa0You will be up and moving around as a Seasonal Merchandising Associate (at least two consecutive hours at a time). \xc2\xa0You'll need to be able to lift at least 30 pounds, and may occasionally need to reach, stoop, kneel, crouch, climb ladders, and reach above eye level. \xc2\xa0The job also involves close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Apply Now
Work your magic with Macy's, apply to become a Seasonal Merchandising Associate today!
\xc2\xa0"
Title: b'Seasonal Merchandising Associate'

Description:
b"Surprise. \xc2\xa0Delight. \xc2\xa0Support. \xc2\xa0Assist.
Our seasonal receiving associates work behind the scenes to provide great shopping experiences to our customers, by unloading and processing merchandise as it enters and leaves the store and assisting with fulfilling and shipping online orders.
You'll also get the chance to get involved in day-to-day operations at the cash register, replenishing supplies on the selling floor and other tasks your store may need. \xc2\xa0
Schedule
You'll have the opportunity to work a flexible scheduled on a part-time temporary basis, as your department and store's needs dictate. \xc2\xa0This may include mornings, evenings, weekends, and busy days like Thanksgiving, Black Friday, and the day after Christmas.
Generous Employee Discount
Starting on your first day, you'll receive a generous employee discount of up to 20% on most items, just in time for holiday shopping!
Physical Demands
Looking to get your steps in? \xc2\xa0You'll be in your feet a lot (at least two consecutive hours). \xc2\xa0You'll need to be able to lift at least 30 pounds, and may occasionally need to reach, stoop, kneel, crouch, climb ladders, and reach above eye level. \xc2\xa0This job also includes close vision, color vision, depth perception, and focal adjustment.
Apply Now
Start making magic as part of our Macy's Seasonal Receiving Team - apply today!
\xc2\xa0
\xc2\xa0"
Title: b'Seasonal Receiving Associate'

Description:
b"Dependable. \xc2\xa0Watchful. \xc2\xa0Helpful. Vigilant.
Do you have a keen eye for details and find yourself aware of everything going on around you? \xc2\xa0Do you want to help ensure a safe, friendly working and shopping environment? \xc2\xa0You can put those talents to work as a Seasonal Asset Protection Security Guard at Macy's, being a visible deterrent to theft and providing customer service at store entrances or walking through high shortage departments.
Schedule
As an essential part of our team,. we'll need you when our stores are busiest, including Thanksgiving day, Friday and Saturday after Thanksgiving, and both the entire weeks before and after Christmas. \xc2\xa0All other days, you'll have flexible scheduling and work available retail hours, including mornings, evenings, and weekends.
Save on Holiday Shopping!
When you start at Macy's, you'll receive a generous employee discount of up to 20% off on most items, on top of our other specials, coupons, promotions.
Physical Demands
You'll need to be able to stand in one spot for mulitple hours at a time as well as regularly required to walk, talk, and hear. \xc2\xa0This job also involved close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception, and focus adjustment.
Apply Now
Ready to make a difference? \xc2\xa0Apply today to be a Seasonal Asset Protection Security Guard!
\xc2\xa0
\xc2\xa0"
Title: b'Seasonal Asset Protection Security Guard'
